events.source:
[Wikipedia]. "[End of Roman rule in Britain]" Last Edited: 2023-09-19.
Last Viewed: 2023-10-11.


[End of Roman rule in Britain]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/End_of_Roman_rule_in_Britain

[Wikipedia]: https://wikipedia.org/
events.description: By 410, the last of the Roman magistrates and soldiers had been expelled from Britain following sucessive withdrawals of the bulk of Roman troops over the proceeding 30 years.

events.source:
* speculation 
* [Wikipedia]. "[Hadrian's Wall]" Last Edited 2023-10-05.
  Last viewed 2020-10-11.

[Wikipedia]: https://wikipedia.org/

[Hadrian's Wall]: https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Hadrian%27s_Wall
events.blurb: Hadrian's Wall marks the northern extent of Christianity.
events.description: This is pure speculation on my part. I am basing this on the fact that the Wall marks the furthest north that the Romans had a consist presence. I have found no evidence that missionaries were particularly effective among the Pict or Scots.
